means: 使疏远（尤指家庭成员之间）

sentence.Network_en: Madeleine was not trying to estrange her from the Herzogs.
sentence.Network_cn: 马德琳无意要使她和赫索格家的人疏远.

sentence.Network_en: His behaviour estrange him from his brother.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的行为使他与哥哥疏远了.

sentence.Network_en: His constant need to travel served to estrange him from most family activities.
sentence.Network_cn: 他经常需要远游而无法参加家人大多数的活动.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... estop 阻止，禁止 estrange 使疏远 evanish 消失.
英语词汇综合宝典 ... 1033 esteem n. 尊敬,尊重 1034 estrange v. 使疏远,离间,使离开 1035 etch n. 腐蚀剂.
英语词汇综合宝典 ... 1033 esteem n. 尊敬,尊重 1034 estrange v. 使疏远,离间,使离开 1035 etch n. 腐蚀剂.

list.abs: 文化隔阂,cultural... ... ) colour bar 肤色隔阂 ) cultural estrangement 文化隔阂 ) dialectal gulfs 方言隔阂.
He has consistently denied murdering his estranged wife ., 他自始至终否认谋杀了分居的妻子.
殊异(the estranged)(洪凌,1995:42).表面上看来,李威有许多「金蝉脱壳」的蜕变契机,但是他都无法清楚地掌握,因此他在忍受严重压力 …
She permitted her son to visit her estranged husband ., 她允许她的儿子去看望她分居的丈夫.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Old French estranger, from Latin extraneare 'treat as a stranger', from extraneus 'not belonging to the family', used as a noun to mean 'stranger'. Compare with strange

means.word_mean: 1. remove from customary environment or associations;

sentences.sentence: "Her busy schedule removed her from her duties as a mother"

means.word_mean: 2. arouse hostility or indifference in where there had formerly been love, affection, or friendliness
使疏远(尤指家庭成员之间)

sentences.en: The argument estranged him from his brother.
sentences.cn: 争吵使他同他的兄弟之间的关系疏远了。

sentences.en: Some of my friends estranged themselves from me in my misfortune.
sentences.cn: 我倒霉时, 有些朋友就疏远了我。
